definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: stripe, blow;—abs. ´[[הַבּ]] Is 1:6 + 2 t.; sf. [[חַבֻּרָתִי]] Ge 4:23; [[חֲבֻרָתוֹ]] Is 53:5; pl. cstr. [[חַבֻּרוֹת]] Pr 20:30; sf. [[חַבּוּרׂתָָי]] Ps 38:6:—stripe, blow, stroke, Ge 4:23 my blow, i.e. for striking me (J), cf. Ex 21:25; Ex 21:25 (JE), also of injury to land of Judah (under fig. of human body) Is 1:6 (all ‖[[פֶּחַע]], v. infr.); of blows (sg. coll.) inflicted on suffering servant of ´[[י]] Is 53:5; (pl.) Ps 38:6, [[חַבֻּרוֹת פֶּחַע]] Pr 20:30, i.e. blows that cut in (‖[[מַכּוֹת]]).
